PHRASE.LANG: Ultra modern sofa "transports" its passengers to another place. [#Legal]
Ultramodernes Sofa, das seine Passagiere an einen anderen Ort befördert. [#Legal]
Divano ultra moderno che "trasporta" quelli che si siedono in un altro luogo. [#Legal]
Sofá ultra moderno capaz de transportar a aquellos que se sienten a otro lugar. [#Legal]
Ultra modern sofa "transports" its passengers to another place. [#Legal]
